DOC.detailed_description: The propose clinical trial Phase I/II imaging , open label , single site study . In Phase I , one 18F-FAZA PET scan conduct patient know squamous cell carcinoma Head & Neck , SCLC , NSCLC , lymphoma , GGM , neuroendocrine tumours renal cell carcinoma . In Phase II , three 18F-FAZA PET scan do patient tumours follow : one pre-treatment , one mid course one post-treatment .
